comments:
The UML2 property descriptor incorrectly assumes that its item property 
descriptor is always an instance of UML2ItemPropertyDescriptor.

!MESSAGE org/eclipse/emf/edit/provider/ItemPropertyDescriptor incompatible with 
org/eclipse/uml2/edit/internal/provider/UML2ItemPropertyDescriptor
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException: 
org/eclipse/emf/edit/provider/ItemPropertyDescriptor incompatible with 
org/eclipse/uml2/edit/internal/provider/UML2ItemPropertyDescriptor
	at 
org.eclipse.uml2.editor.internal.presentation.UML2PropertyDescriptor$1.getText
(UML2PropertyDescriptor.java:72)
	at 
org.eclipse.uml2.editor.internal.presentation.UML2PropertyDescriptor$3.compare
(UML2PropertyDescriptor.java:112)
	at java.util.Arrays.mergeSort(Arrays.java:1292)
	at java.util.Arrays.sort(Arrays.java:1233)
	at java.util.Collections.sort(Collections.java:169)
	at 
org.eclipse.uml2.editor.internal.presentation.UML2PropertyDescriptor.createPrope
rtyEditor(UML2PropertyDescriptor.java:109)

(PropertySheetEntry.java:318)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.views.properties.PropertySheetViewer.activateCellEditor
(PropertySheetViewer.java:147)

(PropertySheetViewer.java:624)
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.properties.PropertySheetViewer.access$6
(PropertySheetViewer.java:602)
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.properties.PropertySheetViewer$4.mouseDown
(PropertySheetViewer.java:693)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent
(TypedListener.java:132)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:796)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:2772)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:2431)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:1377)
